subject: Information regarding order: SSN4743
description_text:
Hello,

I have order Pro X Ultra pedals with VAM Pro.
Order: SSN4743

 I have few questions:

  *
Will I received new bracket for VAM ?
  *
What type of USB the control box is using ?
  *
Is the DC adapter comme with an EU plug ?

Thank you
Regards,

--
Alexandre

conversations.body_text: Hi Alexandre URBAN,  Have you received the pedals? Apologies for the delayed response, as we had a backlog of emails. Did you receive the U-shaped horizontal mounting bracket? We normally include the power plug corresponding to your country with the order.Â
